definition: to cut down/to fell/to dispatch an expedition against/to attack/to boast/Taiwan pr. [fa1]
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: One day three woodcutters climbed the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 一天三伐木工人攀登山。

sentences.english: Two men are chopping away at a log of wood with regular, ringing blows.
sentences.chinese: 两个伐木工人看着一棵树，带着有规律的铃声。

sentences.english: The lumberjacks carry the logs in their big truck.
sentences.chinese: 伐木工人用大卡车来运送木材。

sentences.english: A feller, who passed it, took no glance at it.
sentences.chinese: 路过的伐木工人，连看都不看它一眼。

sentences.english: One day three woodsmenclimbed the hill where the three trees stood.
sentences.chinese: 一天，三个伐木工人爬上了山顶。

sentences.english: That's right, being a Lumberjack is the worst job in America, based upon the study by JobsRated.com.
sentences.chinese: 是的，成为一个伐木工人是美国最坏的工作。

sentences.english: Two lumberjacks were in a tree-cutting contest.
sentences.chinese: 二个伐木工人在一个切树的竞赛。

sentences.english: The woodcutter had a little house on the fringes of the forest.
sentences.chinese: 那位伐木工人在森林的外缘有一间小屋。

sentences.english: On the opposite end of the career spectrum are lumberjacks .
sentences.chinese: 名列职业排行榜另一端的是伐木工人。

sentences.english: Peter became a news reporter but John remained a woodcutter.
sentences.chinese: 彼得成了新闻记者，而约翰还是一名伐木工人。

sentences.english: It must be a hard life working as a lumberman in siberia.
sentences.chinese: 在西北利亚当一名伐木工人，生活一定很艰苦。

sentences.english: Lumberjacks are recalling his brotherly talking and smiling.
sentences.chinese: 伐木工人正在回忆他亲切的笑语。

sentences.english: The woodman spared(ie did not cut down)a few trees.
sentences.chinese: 伐木工人留下了几棵树没砍掉。

sentences.english: The woodcutters kept on cutting the trees down when I went to the forest.
sentences.chinese: 我到达森林的时候，伐木工人在连续不断地砍树。

sentences.english: It also aids in preserving the rainforest by warding off loggers and big business.
sentences.chinese: 它还艾滋病在维护雨林的抵挡伐木工人和大企业。

sentences.english: "I'm cutting this tree up, " answered the woodcutter.
sentences.chinese: “我在把这棵树砍断，”伐木工人回答道。

definition: to chop wood/to chop down trees
